synopsis.text: Sybel, a daring freelance journalist, stumbles upon a story of a lifetime when she discovers the wreckage of a military plane carrying two top-secret android assassins. Programmed to eliminate the granddaughter of their creator, these M-66 units are now on the loose, turning the city into a deadly battleground. As the military struggles to contain the chaos, Sybel finds herself in a race against time to protect the unsuspecting girl and expose the truth. With the relentless M-66 units hot on their heels, can Sybel and the girl survive this catastrophic game of cat and mouse? Co-directed by Masamune Shirow and Hiroyuki Kitakubo, Black Magic M-66 is an action-packed anime classic that combines intense violence, high-stakes drama, and a touch of humor for an unforgettable viewing experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
